title: Got called a "Norm Hero" :P

replies.body: He was just salty nothing more to it.

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=UdKJfd1M,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-22T09:40:07.409+0000)
>
> He was just salty nothing more to it.

Nonono, he asked it as a genuine question, he wasn't salty/tilted in game (ok maybe a bit tilted gameplay-wise since I'm Lee and I have too many things to counter him with). But nah he was genuine
i saw that guy aswell hes been silver since season 2 HAHAHAHA
Also I can't be bothered to climb out of 'unranked', I've got more things in life than gaming for those who potentially are going to come and make fun of my rank (or lack of)
